actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The duskthorn dryad makes two Thorned Slam or Thorn attacks.

actions.name: Thorned Slam
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Thorn
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d4 + 5) piercing damage.

actions.name: Children of the Forest (1/Day)
actions.desc: The dryad magically calls 1d4 boars, constrictor snakes, or wolves, or it calls 1 child of the briar. The called creatures arrive in 1d4 rounds, acting as allies of the dryad and obeying her spoken commands. The creatures remain for 1 hour, until the dryad dies, or until the dryad dismisses them as a bonus action.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The dryad casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
At will: druidcraft
3/day each: charm person, entangle, invisibility
1/day each: barkskin, spike growth, suggestion

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The dryad has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
special_abilities.desc: The dryad can communicate with beasts and plants as if they shared a language.

special_abilities.name: Tree Stride
special_abilities.desc: Once on her turn, the dryad can use 10 feet of her movement to step magically into one dead tree within her reach and emerge from a second dead tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.
